About Me

Just some things about me

Hi!

My name is Andrew and I am a inspiring Fullstack Developer. I enjoy creating websites and applications, that enhances the users experience. My current skills are in JavaScript and the MERN stack. My next goal is to learn TypeScript and Python. I currently live at Austin, TX.
